
```{r}
library("readr")
library("xts")
library("dygraphs")
```

```{r}
wx_ames_txt <-
  read_file(system.file("extdata", "wx_ames.csv", package = "shinypod"))
```

```{r}
wx_ames <-
  read_csv(wx_ames_txt, locale = locale(tz = "America/Chicago"))
```

```{r}
wx_ames_xts <-
  xts(wx_ames[, c("temp", "dew_pt")], order.by = wx_ames$date)

dygraph(wx_ames_xts)
```
